text: Castle House School is a preparatory day school for boys and girls in England. It was first established in 1944, at Chetwynd End, Newport, Shropshire.ISI Inspection report on Castle House School dated November 2014, accessed 13 September 2015 The school is owned and operated by the Castle House School Trust Ltd, a registered charity, by up to twelve governors of the Trust.Castle House School at collegeofteachers.ac.uk, accessed 13 September 2015 ==References== Category:Schools in England Category:1944 establishments in Europe Category:1940s establishments in England
title: Castle House School
